roi_feature_map:
{
  "resolving_features": [
    "In-app Guidance",
    "Analytics Capabilities",
    "Personalized Onboarding Experiences",
    "Digital Adoption Solutions",
    "Application Analytics",
    "Simulated Training"
  ],
  "details": "The features of Whatfix's product provide a return on investment for Mercedes Benz by improving user adoption of software applications, enhancing software experiences, and maximizing ROI of digital investments. With in-app guidance, Mercedes Benz can reduce the time and resources wasted on inefficient energy management processes, ultimately leading to cost savings and improved sustainability. The analytics capabilities and application analytics features provide valuable insights into user behavior and adoption, allowing Mercedes Benz to track the effectiveness of their digital transformation efforts and make data-driven decisions. The personalized onboarding experiences, digital adoption solutions, and simulated training features help to improve employee training and onboarding experiences, leading to increased productivity and efficiency. Overall, Whatfix's product helps Mercedes Benz to achieve its goals of reducing greenhouse gas emissions, accelerating its path to a fully electric future, and improving its overall sustainability."
}
